name: mummification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of preserving a dead body as a mummy : The ancient mummification process took 70 days. There is speculation that mummification developed in southern Egypt.
More examplesFewer examplesThe documentary looks at the culture and history of mummification.Egyptians typically removed major organs from a corpse as part of the mummification process.The ancient Egyptian custom of mummification grew out of their theology, which placed a premium on preserving bodies for the afterlife.
